options.content:
The System Technical Budget Tables - Archiving is based on 
- the data budget reference document [\[ESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-9\] CSC Operations – ESA Framework – System Technical Budget.pdf](https://omcs.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/66158618/%5BESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-9%5D%20CSC%20Operations%20%E2%80%93%20ESA%20Framework%20%E2%80%93%20System%20Technical%20Budget.pdf?api=v2).
- the data flow reference document [\[ESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-58\] CSC GS Data Flow Configuration.pdf](https://omcs.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/66158618/%5BESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-58%5D%20CSC%20GS%20Data%20Flow%20Configuration.pdf?api=v2).

Data flow document extraction is visible in the ["Data Flow dashboard"](./d/MfmL_E4Vz/golden-rules-and-data-flow?orgId=1) 

# Data selected

From [\[ESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-9\] CSC Operations – ESA Framework – System Technical Budget.pdf](https://omcs.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/66158618/%5BESA-EOPG-EOPGC-TN-9%5D%20CSC%20Operations%20%E2%80%93%20ESA%20Framework%20%E2%80%93%20System%20Technical%20Budget.pdf?api=v2) document some assuption are made to provide the System Technical Budget dashboards.
For System Technical Budget Tables - Archiving the data published at LTA are selected.
 - Section Data Preservation data published at LTA.

**Data collection** are considered as consistent since **01/08/2022**

**Data collection** for **aquisition** are considered as consistent since **15/03/2023**

Values are mean by satellite number in mission. (  i.e.  S1  1  satellite,  S2  mean  of  2  satellite,  S3  mean  of  2  satellite;  S5  1  satellite ) 

For S1, S2, S3 values are mean of the 4 LTA, for S5 values came from S5P_DLR.

# Annexes

## Product type selected

The tables below present how products types are classified in STB level and STB timeliness: 

### For panel **System Technical Budget (  On  Range ) **: 

|Mission|STB Level|STB Timeliness|Real timeliness|Misc.|Product Type|
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|S1|L0|NTC|NTC||EW_RAW__0A, EW_RAW__0C, EW_RAW__0N, EW_RAW__0S, IW_RAW__0A, IW_RAW__0C, IW_RAW__0N, IW_RAW__0S, RF_RAW, S1_RAW__0A, S1_RAW__0C, S1_RAW__0N, S1_RAW__0S, S2_RAW__0A, S2_RAW__0C, S2_RAW__0N, S2_RAW__0S, S3_RAW__0A, S3_RAW__0C, S3_RAW__0N, S3_RAW__0S, S4_RAW__0A, S4_RAW__0C, S4_RAW__0N, S4_RAW__0S, S5_RAW__0A, S5_RAW__0C, S5_RAW__0N, S5_RAW__0S, S6_RAW__0A, S6_RAW__0C, S6_RAW__0N, S6_RAW__0S, WV_RAW__0A, WV_RAW__0C, WV_RAW__0N, WV_RAW__0S|
|S1|L0|NRT|NRT, NRT-PT||EW_RAW__0A, EW_RAW__0C, EW_RAW__0N, EW_RAW__0S, IW_RAW__0A, IW_RAW__0C, IW_RAW__0N, IW_RAW__0S|
|S1|L1|NTC|NTC||EW_GRDM_1A, EW_GRDM_1S, EW_SLC__1A, EW_SLC__1S, IW_GRDH_1A, IW_GRDH_1S, IW_SLC__1A, IW_SLC__1S, S1_GRDH_1A, S1_GRDH_1S, S1_SLC__1A, S1_SLC__1S, S2_GRDH_1A, S2_GRDH_1S, S2_SLC__1A, S2_SLC__1S, S3_GRDH_1A, S3_GRDH_1S, S3_SLC__1A, S3_SLC__1S, S4_GRDH_1A, S4_GRDH_1S, S4_SLC__1A, S4_SLC__1S, S5_GRDH_1A, S5_GRDH_1S, S5_SLC__1A, S5_SLC__1S, S6_GRDH_1A, S6_GRDH_1S, S6_SLC__1A, S6_SLC__1S, WV_SLC__1A, WV_SLC__1S|
|S1|L1|NRT|NRT, NRT-PT||EW_GRDM_1A, EW_GRDM_1S, EW_SLC__1A, EW_SLC__1S, IW_GRDH_1A, IW_GRDH_1S, IW_SLC__1A, IW_SLC__1S|
|S1|L2|NTC|NTC||EW_OCN__2A, EW_OCN__2S, IW_OCN__2A, IW_OCN__2S, S1_OCN__2A, S1_OCN__2S, S2_OCN__2A, S2_OCN__2S, S3_OCN__2A, S3_OCN__2S, S4_OCN__2A, S4_OCN__2S, S5_OCN__2A, S5_OCN__2S, S6_OCN__2A, S6_OCN__2S, WV_OCN__2A, WV_OCN__2S|
|S1|L2|NRT|NRT, NRT-PT||EW_OCN__2A, EW_OCN__2S, IW_OCN__2A, IW_OCN__2S|
|S2|L0|NTC|NOMINAL||MSI_L0__DS, MSI_L0__GR|
|S2|L1|NTC|NOMINAL||MSI_L1A_DS, MSI_L1A_GR, MSI_L1B_DS, MSI_L1B_GR, MSI_L1C___, MSI_L1C_DS, MSI_L1C_TC, MSI_L1C_TL|
|S2|L2|NTC|NOMINAL||MSI_L2A___, MSI_L2A_DS, MSI_L2A_TC, MSI_L2A_TL|
|S3|L0|NTC|NT||OL_0_EFR___, SL_0_SLT___|
|S3|L0|NRT|NR, AL||DO_0_DOP___, DO_0_NAV___, GN_0_GNS___, MW_0_MWR___, OL_0_CR0___, OL_0_CR1___, OL_0_EFR___, SL_0_SLT___, SR_0_CAL___, SR_0_SRA___, TM_0_HKM___, TM_0_HKM2__, TM_0_NAT___|
|S3|L0|NRT|ST||SR_0_SRA___|
|S3|L1|NTC|NT||MW_1_MWR___, OL_1_EFR___, OL_1_ERR___, SL_1_RBT___, SR_1_SRA___, SR_1_SRA_A_, SR_1_SRA_BS, SY_1_MISR__|
|S3|L1|NRT|NR, AL||MW_1_CAL___, MW_1_MWR___, OL_1_EFR___, OL_1_ERR___, OL_1_RAC___, OL_1_SPC___, SL_1_RBT___, SR_1_CAL___, SR_1_SRA___|
|S3|L1|NRT|ST||MW_1_MWR___, SR_1_SRA___, SR_1_SRA_A_, SR_1_SRA_BS, SY_1_MISR__|
|S3|L2|NTC|NT||OL_2_LFR___, OL_2_LRR___, SL_2_FRP___, SL_2_LST___, SR_2_LAN___, SY_2_AOD___, SY_2_SYN___, SY_2_V10___, SY_2_VG1___, SY_2_VGK___, SY_2_VGP___|
|S3|L2|NRT|NR, AL||OL_2_LFR___, OL_2_LRR___, SL_2_LST___, SR_2_LAN___|
|S3|L2|NRT|ST||SR_2_LAN___, SY_2_SYN___, SY_2_V10___, SY_2_VG1___, SY_2_VGK___, SY_2_VGP___|
|S5|L0|NTC|OPER||OPER_L0__ENG_A_, OPER_L0__ODB_1_, OPER_L0__ODB_2_, OPER_L0__ODB_3_, OPER_L0__ODB_4_, OPER_L0__ODB_5_, OPER_L0__ODB_6_, OPER_L0__ODB_7_, OPER_L0__ODB_8_, OPER_L0__SAT_A_|
|S5|L1|NTC|OFFL||OFFL_L1B_CA_SIR, OFFL_L1B_CA_UVN, OFFL_L1B_ENG_DB, OFFL_L1B_IR_SIR, OFFL_L1B_IR_UVN, OFFL_L1B_RA_BD1, OFFL_L1B_RA_BD2, OFFL_L1B_RA_BD3, OFFL_L1B_RA_BD4, OFFL_L1B_RA_BD5, OFFL_L1B_RA_BD6, OFFL_L1B_RA_BD7, OFFL_L1B_RA_BD8|
|S5|L1|NRT|NRTI||NRTI_L1B_ENG_DB, NRTI_L1B_RA_BD1, NRTI_L1B_RA_BD2, NRTI_L1B_RA_BD3, NRTI_L1B_RA_BD4, NRTI_L1B_RA_BD5, NRTI_L1B_RA_BD6, NRTI_L1B_RA_BD7, NRTI_L1B_RA_BD8|
|S5|L2|NTC|OFFL||OFFL_L2__03_TCL, OFFL_L2__AER_AI, OFFL_L2__AER_LH, OFFL_L2__CH4_, OFFL_L2__CLOUD_, OFFL_L2__CO____, OFFL_L2__FRESCO, OFFL_L2__HCHO_, OFFL_L2__NO2___, OFFL_L2__NP_BD3, OFFL_L2__NP_BD6, OFFL_L2__NP_BD7, OFFL_L2__O3____, OFFL_L2__O3__PR, OFFL_L2__SO2___|
|S5|L2|NRT|NRTI||NRTI_L2__03_TCL, NRTI_L2__AER_AI, NRTI_L2__AER_LH, NRTI_L2__CLOUD_, NRTI_L2__CO____, NRTI_L2__FRESCO, NRTI_L2__HCCO_, NRTI_L2__NO2___, NRTI_L2__O3____, NRTI_L2__O3__PR, NRTI_L2__SO2___|

### For the others panel in the dashboard: 

Data cames form System Technical Budget (  On  Range ) panel.

# Dashboard usage

On left top of the dashboard the mean combobox allow to select mean period: 
- by day: values are divided by the number of seconds in the selected periode divided by the number of seconds in 1 day.
- by week: values are divided by the number of seconds in the selected periode divided by the number of seconds in 7 day.
- by month: values are divided by the number of seconds in the selected periode divided by the number of seconds in 30 day.
- by year: values are divided by the number of seconds in the selected periode divided by the number of seconds in 365 day.

Time reference for this dasboard is: sensing_start_date

Important notice: Tables & timelines can only display up to 10 000 entries. Please make use of filters to narrow down the retrieved data and get a more realistic view.

targets.query: (  mission:S1 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_RAW__0A OR product_type:EW_RAW__0C OR product_type:EW_RAW__0N OR product_type:EW_RAW__0S OR product_type:IW_RAW__0A OR product_type:IW_RAW__0C OR product_type:IW_RAW__0N OR product_type:IW_RAW__0S OR product_type:RF_RAW OR product_type:S1_RAW__0A OR product_type:S1_RAW__0C OR product_type:S1_RAW__0N OR product_type:S1_RAW__0S OR product_type:S2_RAW__0A OR product_type:S2_RAW__0C OR product_type:S2_RAW__0N OR product_type:S2_RAW__0S OR product_type:S3_RAW__0A OR product_type:S3_RAW__0C OR product_type:S3_RAW__0N OR product_type:S3_RAW__0S OR product_type:S4_RAW__0A OR product_type:S4_RAW__0C OR product_type:S4_RAW__0N OR product_type:S4_RAW__0S OR product_type:S5_RAW__0A OR product_type:S5_RAW__0C OR product_type:S5_RAW__0N OR product_type:S5_RAW__0S OR product_type:S6_RAW__0A OR product_type:S6_RAW__0C OR product_type:S6_RAW__0N OR product_type:S6_RAW__0S OR product_type:WV_RAW__0A OR product_type:WV_RAW__0C OR product_type:WV_RAW__0N OR product_type:WV_RAW__0S ) AND ( timeliness:NTC )  )  )

(  mission:S1 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_RAW__0A OR product_type:EW_RAW__0C OR product_type:EW_RAW__0N OR product_type:EW_RAW__0S OR product_type:IW_RAW__0A OR product_type:IW_RAW__0C OR product_type:IW_RAW__0N OR product_type:IW_RAW__0S ) AND ( timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT )  )  )

(  mission:S1 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_GRDM_1A OR product_type:EW_GRDM_1S OR product_type:EW_SLC__1A OR product_type:EW_SLC__1S OR product_type:IW_GRDH_1A OR product_type:IW_GRDH_1S OR product_type:IW_SLC__1A OR product_type:IW_SLC__1S OR product_type:S1_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S1_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S1_SLC__1A OR product_type:S1_SLC__1S OR product_type:S2_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S2_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S2_SLC__1A OR product_type:S2_SLC__1S OR product_type:S3_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S3_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S3_SLC__1A OR product_type:S3_SLC__1S OR product_type:S4_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S4_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S4_SLC__1A OR product_type:S4_SLC__1S OR product_type:S5_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S5_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S5_SLC__1A OR product_type:S5_SLC__1S OR product_type:S6_GRDH_1A OR product_type:S6_GRDH_1S OR product_type:S6_SLC__1A OR product_type:S6_SLC__1S OR product_type:WV_SLC__1A OR product_type:WV_SLC__1S ) AND ( timeliness:NTC )  )  )

(  mission:S1 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_GRDM_1A OR product_type:EW_GRDM_1S OR product_type:EW_SLC__1A OR product_type:EW_SLC__1S OR product_type:IW_GRDH_1A OR product_type:IW_GRDH_1S OR product_type:IW_SLC__1A OR product_type:IW_SLC__1S ) AND ( timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT )  )  )

(  mission:S1 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_OCN__2A OR product_type:EW_OCN__2S OR product_type:IW_OCN__2A OR product_type:IW_OCN__2S OR product_type:S1_OCN__2A OR product_type:S1_OCN__2S OR product_type:S2_OCN__2A OR product_type:S2_OCN__2S OR product_type:S3_OCN__2A OR product_type:S3_OCN__2S OR product_type:S4_OCN__2A OR product_type:S4_OCN__2S OR product_type:S5_OCN__2A OR product_type:S5_OCN__2S OR product_type:S6_OCN__2A OR product_type:S6_OCN__2S OR product_type:WV_OCN__2A OR product_type:WV_OCN__2S ) AND ( timeliness:NTC )  )  )

(  mission:S1 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:EW_OCN__2A OR product_type:EW_OCN__2S OR product_type:IW_OCN__2A OR product_type:IW_OCN__2S ) AND ( timeliness:NRT OR timeliness:NRT-PT )  )  )
(  mission:S2 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MSI_L0__DS OR product_type:MSI_L0__GR ) AND ( timeliness:NOMINAL )  )  )

(  mission:S2 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MSI_L1A_DS OR product_type:MSI_L1A_GR OR product_type:MSI_L1B_DS OR product_type:MSI_L1B_GR OR product_type:MSI_L1C___  OR product_type:MSI_L1C_DS OR product_type:MSI_L1C_TC OR product_type:MSI_L1C_TL ) AND ( timeliness:NOMINAL )  )  )
(  mission:S2 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MSI_L2A___  OR product_type:MSI_L2A_DS OR product_type:MSI_L2A_TC OR product_type:MSI_L2A_TL ) AND ( timeliness:NOMINAL )  )  )
(  mission:S3 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OL_0_EFR___ OR product_type:SL_0_SLT___ ) AND ( timeliness:NT )  )  )

(  mission:S3 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:DO_0_DOP___ OR product_type:DO_0_NAV___ OR product_type:GN_0_GNS___ OR product_type:MW_0_MWR___ OR product_type:OL_0_CR0___ OR product_type:OL_0_CR1___ OR product_type:OL_0_EFR___ OR product_type:SL_0_SLT___ OR product_type:SR_0_CAL___ OR product_type:SR_0_SRA___ OR product_type:TM_0_HKM___ OR product_type:TM_0_HKM2__ OR product_type:TM_0_NAT___ ) AND ( timeliness:NR OR timeliness:AL )  )  OR (   ( product_type:SR_0_SRA___ ) AND ( timeliness:ST )  )  )

(  mission:S3 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MW_1_MWR___ OR product_type:OL_1_EFR___ OR product_type:OL_1_ERR___ OR product_type:SL_1_RBT___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA_A_ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA_BS OR product_type:SY_1_MISR__ ) AND ( timeliness:NT )  )  )

(  mission:S3 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:MW_1_CAL___ OR product_type:MW_1_MWR___ OR product_type:OL_1_EFR___ OR product_type:OL_1_ERR___ OR product_type:OL_1_RAC___ OR product_type:OL_1_SPC___ OR product_type:SL_1_RBT___ OR product_type:SR_1_CAL___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA___ ) AND ( timeliness:NR OR timeliness:AL )  )  OR (   ( product_type:MW_1_MWR___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA___ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA_A_ OR product_type:SR_1_SRA_BS OR product_type:SY_1_MISR__ ) AND ( timeliness:ST )  )  )

(  mission:S3 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OL_2_LFR___ OR product_type:OL_2_LRR___ OR product_type:SL_2_FRP___ OR product_type:SL_2_LST___ OR product_type:SR_2_LAN___ OR product_type:SY_2_AOD___ OR product_type:SY_2_SYN___ OR product_type:SY_2_V10___ OR product_type:SY_2_VG1___ OR product_type:SY_2_VGK___ OR product_type:SY_2_VGP___ ) AND ( timeliness:NT )  )  )

(  mission:S3 AND service_type:LTA )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OL_2_LFR___ OR product_type:OL_2_LRR___ OR product_type:SL_2_LST___ OR product_type:SR_2_LAN___ ) AND ( timeliness:NR OR timeliness:AL )  )  OR (   ( product_type:SR_2_LAN___ OR product_type:SY_2_SYN___ OR product_type:SY_2_V10___ OR product_type:SY_2_VG1___ OR product_type:SY_2_VGK___ OR product_type:SY_2_VGP___ ) AND ( timeliness:ST )  )  )

(  mission:S5 AND service_type:LTA AND service_id:S5P_DLR )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OPER_L0__ENG_A_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_1_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_2_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_3_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_4_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_5_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_6_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_7_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__ODB_8_ OR product_type:OPER_L0__SAT_A_ ) AND ( timeliness:OPER )  )  )

(  mission:S5 AND service_type:LTA AND service_id:S5P_DLR )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OFFL_L1B_CA_SIR OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_CA_UVN OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_ENG_DB OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_IR_SIR OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_IR_UVN OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD1 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD2 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD3 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD4 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD5 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD6 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD7 OR product_type:OFFL_L1B_RA_BD8 ) AND ( timeliness:OFFL )  )  )

(  mission:S5 AND service_type:LTA AND service_id:S5P_DLR )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:NRTI_L1B_ENG_DB OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD1 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD2 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD3 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD4 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD5 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD6 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD7 OR product_type:NRTI_L1B_RA_BD8 ) AND ( timeliness:NRTI )  )  )

(  mission:S5 AND service_type:LTA AND service_id:S5P_DLR )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:OFFL_L2__03_TCL OR product_type:OFFL_L2__AER_AI OR product_type:OFFL_L2__AER_LH OR product_type:OFFL_L2__CH4_ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__CLOUD_ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__CO____ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__FRESCO OR product_type:OFFL_L2__HCHO_ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__NO2___ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__NP_BD3 OR product_type:OFFL_L2__NP_BD6 OR product_type:OFFL_L2__NP_BD7 OR product_type:OFFL_L2__O3____ OR product_type:OFFL_L2__O3__PR OR product_type:OFFL_L2__SO2___ ) AND ( timeliness:OFFL )  )  )

(  mission:S5 AND service_type:LTA AND service_id:S5P_DLR )   AND  (  (   ( product_type:NRTI_L2__03_TCL OR product_type:NRTI_L2__AER_AI OR product_type:NRTI_L2__AER_LH OR product_type:NRTI_L2__CLOUD_ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__CO____ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__FRESCO OR product_type:NRTI_L2__HCCO_ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__NO2___ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__O3____ OR product_type:NRTI_L2__O3__PR OR product_type:NRTI_L2__SO2___ ) AND ( timeliness:NRTI )  )  )

panels.title: Archived Product Volume per Mission ( in TiB )

list.description: Select mean interval on the period: none (value on the period), by day, by week (day * 7), by month (day * 30), by year (day * 365)
list.label: Mean
list.name: mean_period
list.query: by day : 86400, by week : 604800, by month : 2592000, by year : 31536000
